org.opendaylight.controller.sal.rest.doc.api

Interface ApiDocService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApiDocServiceImpl

    public interface ApiDocService
    This service generates swagger (See https://helloreverb.com/developers/swagger) compliant documentation for RESTCONF APIs. The output of this is used by embedded Swagger UI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getApiExplorer(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Redirects to embedded swagger ui.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDocByModule(java.lang.String module, java.lang.String revision, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Generates Swagger compliant document listing APIs for module.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getListOfMounts(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Generates index document for Swagger UI.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMountDocByModule(java.lang.String instanceNum, java.lang.String module, java.lang.String revision, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Generates Swagger compliant document listing APIs for module.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMountRootDoc(java.lang.String instanceNum, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo) 
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getRootDoc(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Generates index document for Swagger UI.

    • Method Detail

      • getRootDoc

        javax.ws.rs.core.Response getRootDoc(@Context
                                   javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Generates index document for Swagger UI. This document lists out all modules with link to get APIs for each module. The API for each module is served by getDocByModule() method.
        Parameters:
        uriInfo -
        Returns:
